product_name: Maui Jim Banyans Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Banyans polarized sunglasses shade your eyes from the sun's harmful rays using Maui JimPolarizedPlus(R)2 technology. They also boost colors and eliminate glare,. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV from all angles while managing harmful blue light and boosting colors for clarity and contrast. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Fusing the best qualities of glass and polycarbonate, Maui Evolution(R) lenses offer superior optics and scratch- and impact-resistance, all in a lightweight package. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Lenses and frames feature a special effectiveness treatment for use in saltwater. Gray lenses providecontrast and high light reduction suitable for all light conditions, especially bright, direct sunlight. Adjustable silicone nose pads prevent slippage. Maui Jim Banyans polarized sunglasses come with a semi-rigid case and a soft pouch for cleaning and storage.
short_description: Banyans polarized sunglasses shade your eyes from the sun's harmful rays using Maui JimPolarizedPlus(R)2 technology. They also boost colors and eliminate glare,.
